attributes.title: Phocuswright Europe
attributes.description: Do you want to join the best networking event in travel? Then you can not miss out on the Phocuswright Europe in Barcelona. Meet our Head of Business Development, Anke Hsu, and our Community Manager, Juan Sanchez, and get the chance to inform yourself about the latest news of web3 in travel and to join an event with the most influential leaders of the travel industry.

attributes.name: Ralf Usbeck
attributes.bio: Ralf Usbeck is the founder and CEO of Peakwork AG. Customers of his leading technologies include international travel companies & global Internet giants such as Google and Facebook. In 2013, Ralf Usbeck received an international award as 'Serial Innovator of Travel Technology' at the World Travel Market in London. He is also the founder of TravelTainment (sold to Amadeus in 2006), Vtours, and Weekend.com.

attributes.name: Anke Hsu
attributes.bio: With more than 25 years of experience in the travel industry, Anke Hsu has worked in various leadership positions for the Lufthansa Group, flights.com, Sabre Corporation, FTI Group, and InteRES GmbH (a subsidiary of TUI) at locations in Germany, France, Switzerland, the USA, and Brazil. In addition to her position as Head of Business Development and Growth at Chain4Travel, she is an external doctoral blockchain researcher at the University of Zurich, ranked as one of the top blockchain universities worldwide.

attributes.name: Juan B Sanchez
attributes.bio: Juan B Sanchez has lived in Cordoba, Madrid, Rabat, Milan, Manchester, and Valencia coast. He started in 2002 in the travel business, becoming a sport & culture group travel specialist. So far, Juan has organized over 200 tours and events and founded his own company: Odisea Tours. Due to the covid pause, he had to reinvent himself and found on blockchain online communities an exciting opportunity to evolve professionally. He now mixes his two passions: blockchain & people, and helps the Chain4Travel team to develop and grow the Camino Network community.

attributes.title: World Aviation Festival
attributes.description: Our team is excited to be part of the biggest aviation conferences and exhibitions. Meet our Managing Director and Head of Development, Daniel Poerschke, and our Head of Business Development, Anke Hsu at World Aviation Festival. Discuss with them how Camino Network can change the aviation industry. See you in Lisbon!

attributes.name: Anke Hsu
attributes.bio: With more than 25 years of experience in the travel industry, Anke Hsu has worked in various leadership positions for the Lufthansa Group, flights.com, Sabre Corporation, FTI Group, and InteRES GmbH (a subsidiary of TUI) at locations in Germany, France, Switzerland, the USA, and Brazil. In addition to her position as Head of Business Development and Growth at Chain4Travel, she is an external doctoral blockchain researcher at the University of Zurich, ranked as one of the top blockchain universities worldwide.

attributes.name: Daniel Poerschke
attributes.bio: As Managing Director and Head of Product at Chain4Travel, Daniel supports the creation of a decentralized infrastructure for the travel industry. Daniel is a tech enthusiast with a background in the hospitality industry. He studied International Management (Dipl. BWL) and Computer Science (M. Sc.) and started his career in the hospitality industry as Food & Beverage Manager and Sales Manager before diving into Travel Tech at Peakwork, taking on the roles of Technical Project Manager and Product Owner at Peakwork. There, he helped launching the Rail-Package-Player and utilizing innovative A.I. to manage non-bookable-content.

attributes.title: HEDNA
attributes.description: HEDNA has become the leading voice in advancing the use of technology in the hospitality industry. We look forward to this unique opportunity to meet industry leaders, technology providers, and hoteliers from around the world. Overall, we are more than excited to introduce Camino Network, which cannot only tackle the challenges the industry faces today but also open up new opportunities for the future of hospitality.

attributes.name: Pablo Castillo
attributes.bio: Pablo Castillo, CIO and Executive Board member Hotelplan Group 2014 to 2021, has vast and proven experience delivering complex projects across all European markets with a strong business focus. He started his career in tourism over 20 years selling trips for Kuoni and has held various positions in Data & Content Management, eCommerce, Project & Innovation Program management.

attributes.name: Sam Jaarsma
attributes.bio: Before moving to Mallorca in 2001, Sam was active in programming, testing, and IT project management in the finance sector in Holland. He started his journey in tourism with the accommodation integration of easyJet for Hotelbeds. From 2007 at MTS Globe, he was responsible for the development of provider and distribution integrations. At Chain4Travel, Sam’s focus is the implementation of open-source data standards for an easy transition to web3 for the travel industry.

attributes.title: Phocuswright Conference
attributes.description: We are excited to join the Phocuswright Conference. Our Head of Business Development Americas, Jhon Ruiz, and our Head of Business Development, Anke Hsu, are visiting the event in Fort Lauderdale and are thrilled to discuss the possibilities of web3 technologies in travel. Join us to learn about the opportunities of the Camino Network for the travel industry.

attributes.name: Anke Hsu
attributes.bio: With more than 25 years of experience in the travel industry, Anke Hsu has worked in various leadership positions for the Lufthansa Group, flights.com, Sabre Corporation, FTI Group, and InteRES GmbH (a subsidiary of TUI) at locations in Germany, France, Switzerland, the USA, and Brazil. In addition to her position as Head of Business Development and Growth at Chain4Travel, she is an external doctoral blockchain researcher at the University of Zurich, ranked as one of the top blockchain universities worldwide.

attributes.title: Blockchance 23
attributes.description: Meet us at Blockchance 23, one of Europe's leading blockchain conferences, where our CEO, Ralf, will be on a panel discussion. Discover the latest innovations in blockchain technology and connect with Ralf to learn about the groundbreaking advances Camino Network is bringing to the travel industry as an industry-specific L1 blockchain. See you in Hamburg.

attributes.name: Ralf Usbeck
attributes.bio: Ralf Usbeck is the founder and CEO of Peakwork AG. Customers of his leading technologies include international travel companies & global Internet giants such as Google and Facebook. In 2013, Ralf Usbeck received an international award as 'Serial Innovator of Travel Technology' at the World Travel Market in London. He is also the founder of TravelTainment (sold to Amadeus in 2006), Vtours, and Weekend.com.
